TopicTitle: Is there a readout for Delta - V?

Articles.Content:
Quick question: is there an in-game readout for the delta-V of a rocket/ stage, or do I have to work it out?

FYI: I consider add-ins cheating

A spreadsheet or web calculator would not be cheating... as long I write it myself!

Get Kerbal Engineer. It will give you delta v/stage while in VAB, and very useful info during flight. It only gives you information, so I dont't consider it cheating. It is the only mod I run, but it makes building and flying more precise without having to wade through a bunch of calculations or constantly swapping between map and normal views. Here's the Spaceport link: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/0-18-1-kerbal-engineer-redux-v0-5/

If you still consider it cheating, there are some spreadsheets floating around out there.
Cheers. I'll take a look and if I still think it's cheating will try writing a spreadsheet!
